Posts.Content: i have ibc brest cancer stage 4 and have had it sinnce june 29.2000.i had chemo surgey more chemo and then a reoccurance in my arm. so i thrn had radiation and chemo together annd thats when herceptin was put on board and that was sept of 2001. i was on herceptin with toxak weekly then went to herceptin every two weeks . went several years that wayand they took me off herceptin for 6 weeks but i got a hot spot in my back and was put back on and hot spot cleared up and i been on it every since and it is july 31 of 2011.so there are a lot of us out there and many will take herceptin till the end. as the years go buy i notce a few more ache and pains but i was 50 when i srarted and now i am 62 so age might play a roll in it .i habe a email address i will give u if u want to ask any questions lginny19@yahoo.com. take care ane keep fighting frieend ginnyl
Posts.Title: her2neu breast cancer positive
